name: places/ChIJ2THUPOZYwokRfokKkDq5JRo
adrFormatAddress: 1163 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text: i got my eyebrows done here and usually i get wax and not threading whatever right so the lady shes doing my eyebrows and everything was good but then after she waxed my eyebrows she started threading my eyebrows??? the next day i woke up, my entire forehead was filled with bumps i had the biggest rash i've gotten my eyebrows waxed before and that literally never happened not only that but my eyebrow shapes were 2 DIFFERENT SHAPES she also seperated my eyebrows wayy to far apart now i have to let them grow i didnt realize in the salon but the next day it was awful she rushed and it seemed very careless!! i went with my friend as well and she used the same threading string for her brows on mines then when we were done paying she had an attitude because we didnt tip her but we explained to her that we didnt have enough money. would not recommend this place to anyone

text.text: i got my eyebrows done here and usually i get wax and not threading whatever right so the lady shes doing my eyebrows and everything was good but then after she waxed my eyebrows she started threading my eyebrows??? the next day i woke up, my entire forehead was filled with bumps i had the biggest rash i've gotten my eyebrows waxed before and that literally never happened not only that but my eyebrow shapes were 2 DIFFERENT SHAPES she also seperated my eyebrows wayy to far apart now i have to let them grow i didnt realize in the salon but the next day it was awful she rushed and it seemed very careless!! i went with my friend as well and she used the same threading string for her brows on mines then when we were done paying she had an attitude because we didnt tip her but we explained to her that we didnt have enough money. would not recommend this place to anyone

originalText.text:
I usually go to their other locations and am really happy with them.  This women  at this location was AWFUL.  She was so rough and finished one eyebrow in less than 30 seconds.  I want the work to be quick-- but I'd still like it to be precise and somewhat gentle.  I'm not new to threading, I have been doing it for more than 15 years.  However I started tearing up because it was hurting so much. She started reprimanding me that I waited too long (I didn't, I went at my regular interval) at which point I said I am used to the other location being a bit more gentle.

Once I said hat she immediately stopped and started yelling at me!! In the salon, she just went off on me.  I was in utter shock. She finished up the left eyebrow and it was thinner and not even to the right (which was already too thin, I only asked for a clean up).

I asked for her name and she refused to give it to me.  I have never, ever been treated so poorly.  I wish I could put her name here so you could avoid her like the plague, but instead, perhaps its just better to go to another location where 1.) they take their time 2.) they are good at what they do and 3.) they don't yell at you and treat you like garbage.

In case the manager reads this, I went in around 4:30pm on 11/11/15.  This employee needs to be fired.

originalText.text: Avoid. Just spent $80 (4x the amount I usually spend in Long Island) for a full leg and bikini wax. Woman who did it missed about a quarter of the back of my thigh... And my hairs are long and dark and pretty hard to miss. She also missed other small patches, which is ok, but a patch the size of my hand is not. Nor is requesting a tip (asking how much tip I'd want to leave, while she's holding the tablet, with the minimum amount  being 15%) after charging $30 for *just* my bikini line (not Brazilian). Also, it took at least 45 minutes, when it usually takes max 20 minutes in Long Island. Avoid avoid avoid.

originalText.text: Avoid. Went in for a Brazilian. It is DIRTY. The "new" protective sheet on the bed had grease stains and there was a used dirty Q-tip on the floor which they hadn't bothered to pick up. They only do strip wax and don't know what hot wax is. The woman had no idea how to wax properly and so it was more painful. Also tried to overcharge me as soon as they heard I was not from New York. At the end I felt like I needed to shower right after just because the whole thing felt so disgusting.

originalText.text: I go to the location on 2nd ave in Manhattan and i love it! Somi & Rashmin are so lovely!! they slay my eyebrows every time they always pay attention to how i tell them i want my brows. I love them. I highly recommend them to anyone whose interested in going here.
